entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 07:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. Forecast issued 06:03 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 06:03 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 06:03 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
